title: Mazoku No Pet Ni Narimashite
alternative_title: 魔族のペットになりまして ; Menjadi hewan peliharaan iblis
status: 魔族のペットになりまして ; Menjadi hewan peliharaan iblis
description:
Description :
        One day, Takafumi Ayanokoji, an ordinary high school boy, is warned by a suspicious fortune teller that he is in trouble with women. Immediately after that, along with heavy rain and lightning, a beautiful girl with blonde hair and red eyes appeared. The girl follows Takafumi to his house and says she wants to keep him as a pet, but...!?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: A Vampire's Search For A Pet
